member.name: M:RI.RIResourceProvider.DataClean(System.Object)

member.name: M:RI.RIResourceProvider.DataClean(System.Object,System.String)
member.summary: This method is used to remove undesirable characters from the data that has been provided. If the input value is empty the default value will be returned.
